extendedInfo.description: *** N O W F R E E ***Will you be able to survive the onslaught of the zombie horde?Grab your gun and protect your family from wave after wave of the undead.How long will YOU survive?-------------------------------------------------------------------------This game has been tested on Sony Ericsson Xperia PLAY, Samsung Galaxy S2, Samsung Galaxy Gio, HTC Desire S and HTC Evo 4G.We can't promise that the game will work on any untested device.-------------------------------------------------------------------------*Highlighted features*â¢ NOW FREE, full game.â¢ Highly addictive game play.â¢ Latest generation FULL 3D with premiere quality graphics, very high detail.â¢ Different powerful weapons for slaying zombies.â¢ Challenging boss levels.â¢ Superior soundâ¢ Consol type of game controls. Give it 10min to master and you will never go back!-------------------------------------------------------------------------*Storyline*Overrun with the living dead, the young family seeks refuge from the city to their safeheaven, the cabin in the mountains. But they are fresh out of luck. The zombie infestation has reached even this peaceful remote outpost.Now you have to do all you can to protect your wife and daughter.-------------------------------------------------------------------------*COMMING SOON!*Updates will come soon with exciting new features.-------------------------------------------------------------------------*Release note*We only support Android version from 2.0.1 and up.-------------------------------------------------------------------------*Additional media*THE DEAD: CHAPTER ONE: homepage: www.corncrowgames.com/games/the-deadVideo trailer & media: homepage: www.corncrowgames.com/games/the-dead-------------------------------------------------------------------------*Version*v.1.2.4

reviews.title: Nice graphics
reviews.comment: I think its a good game but i can\'t play this on my galaxy y duos,i want to play this game please solve that problem plz
reviews.author: Subash Thankappan

reviews.title: goodone
reviews.comment: a good game ....i just like its grPhics and story a very awsom game i gave it 4 star not 5 bcz i hv to use chainfire to play this game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why only 2 weapons
reviews.comment: Its cool but every time I exit off the game my data is never saved.And there are only two weapons.
reviews.author: Tyson Liles

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Pretty good game keeps you on your toes, I uninstalled because of controls.
reviews.author: Temi Ogunniyi

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I love it. Please fix the controls. Otherwise once you get used to it it super fun.
reviews.author: Texas Tillery

reviews.title: Graphix
reviews.comment: I think its a pretty good game but I cannot play it in my galaxy Y
reviews.author: Rini Sarkar

reviews.title: It\'s fun remind me of cod zombie
reviews.comment: It\'s a good game but the only thing I don\'t like it\'s wen u aim to someone it move slow & I would like more weapon to like a shotgun would b nice
reviews.author: Jay Hollywood

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Its a pretty cool game but need more weapons and space to play in  It start lagging on wave 20 On my HTC evo shift plz fix and add more weapons and space on next update Ill rate\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205 But into then ill rate \342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205
reviews.author: william reed

reviews.title: Can\'t play
reviews.comment: As I enter the game the main menu makes me excited then as I click play it will crash
reviews.author: johnrick rogel roman

reviews.title: Needs improvement but really fun
reviews.comment: U guys should make it so u can buy guns and upgrade them like in cod zombies and dead trigger. It would be way more addictive and a lot of my friends don\'t get the game because of this so please add that otherwise awesome game.
reviews.author: Paul Maurer

reviews.title: Horrible controls
reviews.comment: Looking around and aiming is so laggy, it\'s pretty much unplayable. Note 2 users don\'t bother.
reviews.author: Shaun Gephart

reviews.title: Good but dire controls
reviews.comment: Needs smoother aiming but good otherwise
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome Game
reviews.comment: Nice game but controls are hard to use this game is creepy if u add a mini map to show where zombies are located so u can easily seem them and a feature of double tap on screen for 180\302\260 turn would be nice... overall the quality and graphics are awe playing it on my SGP(GT-S5300) but requires a chainfire 3D to play without it, it FC... it should have age restriction very scary. :-)
reviews.author: Muzi Mahlangu

reviews.title: Excellent job! ^U^
reviews.comment: \"The DEAD- **N0W FREE**\" is a very vivid, detailed game. It captures the haunted feeling of something eerie is going on... has a great story, creative weapons like the nailgun, a lot of effort to this game. Needs better handgun reload animations tho! Brav0!
reviews.author: Bladess Infernos

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: The controls are just bad. Every time I aim the gun fires and waste ammo and I cant even change any of the settings. Just another terrible game people think is good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome zombie shooter
reviews.comment: This game is amazing. It\'s addictive, simple, and really fun. But it could use a bigger map. Other than that, it\'s a really good game.
reviews.author: Nima Faraji

reviews.title: Well done!
reviews.comment: Great graphics. Lots of fun. The controls are a bit hardcore but I\'ve just learned you can turn 180 degrees by swiping the screen, which is a huge help. The dev told me more traditional swipe controls will be available in version 2.0. Lookin\' forward to it.
reviews.author: Neil Sanford

reviews.title: It was good
reviews.comment: But needs better graphics and more guns or just make it like cod black ops
reviews.author: Eugene Isaac

reviews.title: awsome but dead trigger is better
reviews.comment: this is a nice game but dead trigger is better because dead trigger has more realistic zombies and dead trigger also has better guns and items but  this is still an awsome game so a gave in the raiting 3 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Controls
reviews.comment: I don\'t want to spend the time trying to get the controls to work. DEAD TRIGGER already has good controls and is more fun. Good try though. Steal their controls and this would be a good game.
reviews.author: Derek Camp
